gunslinger.name: Gimme a Reason
gunslinger.description: Start with Frag Grenade and Compact SMG. Movement has no effect on weapon accuracy, recoil effect also reduced

gunslinger.name: Fire in the Hole
gunslinger.description: Frag Grenade can kill 25% more targets (base: 14)

gunslinger.name: Impact Grenades
gunslinger.description: Frag Grenades explode on impact. They deal 100% more damage but have 50% smaller explosion radius

gunslinger.name: Power Nap
gunslinger.description: Unequipped weapon automatically reloads after 7 seconds

gunslinger.name: Special mag
gunslinger.description: Killing an enemy with a grenade increases penetration of all weapons by 1 for 5 seconds

gunslinger.name: Swapping Mags!
gunslinger.description: Reload speed increased by 25% on all weapons

gunslinger.name: Front Line Supply
gunslinger.description: Headshots made with primary or secondary weapons automatically restore 5% rounds to the magazine

gunslinger.name: Adrenaline
gunslinger.description: Reloading a weapon with less than 25% ammo in the magazine provides a 50% reload speed boost for 5 seconds

gunslinger.name: Refilling
gunslinger.description: Reloading a fully unloaded primary weapon increases its next magazine's capacity by 15%

gunslinger.name: Heavy Metal
gunslinger.description: Start with improved MAG5 Machinegun that deals 50% more damage, and has 50% more ammo. All MAG5 machinegun pickups also improved

gunslinger.name: Gunner
gunslinger.description: Start with Sporting Carbine PAC-15

gunslinger.name: This is My Rifle
gunslinger.description: Start with ARK-103 Assault Rifle

gunslinger.name: S890
gunslinger.description: Start with an S890 Combat Shotgun

gunslinger.name: Seek and Destroy
gunslinger.description: All active special zombies within a radius of 20 meters will be automatically marked

gunslinger.name: Bounty Hunter
gunslinger.description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

gunslinger.name: Wheatgrass
gunslinger.description: Health increased by 25%

gunslinger.name: Sleight of Hand
gunslinger.description: Switch weapons 150% faster

gunslinger.name: Sort it all out
gunslinger.description: Emptying the magazine of the primary weapon loads the secondary weapon with explosive rounds

gunslinger.name: Gun Fanatic
gunslinger.description: Draining primary and secondary weapons' magazines automatically reloads primary weapon

gunslinger.name: Concentration
gunslinger.description: Killing 5 zombies consecutively with only headshots grants temporary health boost (cooldown 30 seconds)

gunslinger.name: Judo
gunslinger.description: When pinned down by usual or special zombies you will automatically rise up and push your attackers back (cooldown 180 seconds)

gunslinger.name: Encore
gunslinger.description: Instead of becoming incapacitated, you gain a 75% temporary health boost and keep going (cooldown: 180 seconds)

gunslinger.name: Welcoming Committee
gunslinger.description: Stationary machinegun ammo increased by 25% for all teammates

gunslinger.name: S890 Shorty
gunslinger.description: Start with a S890 Shorty in your secondary weapon slot

gunslinger.name: Senjata
gunslinger.description: Start with a Senjata PDW in your secondary weapon slot

gunslinger.name: Bad odor
gunslinger.description: There is a chance that killing a special zombie will cause it to drop a primary weapon (cooldown: 180 seconds)

gunslinger.name: My Bad
gunslinger.description: Deal 50% less friendly fire damage to your teammates

gunslinger.name: Deep Pockets
gunslinger.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons increased by 25%

gunslinger.name: Action Hero
gunslinger.description: When you become the last of your team still standing you gain ability to shoot with your primary and secondary weapons without spending rounds in its magazines for 7 seconds

gunslinger.name: Free Refill
gunslinger.description: Restore 3% of primary weapon ammo for each kill made with equipment

gunslinger.name: The more the merrier
gunslinger.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons is increased by 5% for the entire team

gunslinger.name: Work Belt
gunslinger.description: Max number of Frag Grenades increased to 3

gunslinger.name: Pocket Factory
gunslinger.description: You won't be able to pick equipment bags on the mission, but your equipment will be constantly regenerating (150 seconds to replenish to maximum)

gunslinger.name: Headhunter Reward
gunslinger.description: Killing 5 zombies consecutively with only headshots refills one equipment charge (cooldown 15 seconds)

gunslinger.name: It's not over
gunslinger.description: Infinite equipment slot usage for 10 seconds when you become the last member of your team still standing. Your equipment charges get fully restored (cooldown: 180 seconds)

gunslinger.name: Annihilator
gunslinger.description: Primary, secondary and heavy weapons deal 15% more damage.

gunslinger.name: Switcheroo
gunslinger.description: Switching to primary or secondary weapons increases firearm damage by 50% for 5 seconds

gunslinger.name: Thrifty
gunslinger.description: Reloading a weapon with less than 25% ammo in the magazine provides a 50% firearm damage boost for 3 seconds

gunslinger.name: I'm not alone
gunslinger.description: Firearm damage increased by 10% for the whole team

gunslinger.name: War Face
gunslinger.description: Killing 25 zombies in rapid succession grants 50% firearm damage boost to entire team for 20 seconds

gunslinger.name: Swapping Mags II
gunslinger.description: Reload speed increased by 10% on primary weapons

gunslinger.name: Swapping Mags III
gunslinger.description: Reload speed increased by 15% on secondary weapons

gunslinger.name: Deep Pockets II
gunslinger.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons increased by 10%

gunslinger.name: Fire in The Hole II
gunslinger.description: Frag Grenade can kill 20% more targets (base: 14)

gunslinger.name: My Bad II
gunslinger.description: Take 10% less friendly fire damage

gunslinger.name: I won't budge from this spot!
gunslinger.description: Fully depleting the ammo of a Stationary Machine Gun results in a 10% chance (5% for the Horde mode) to receive a new one

gunslinger.name: Hold the line!
gunslinger.description: The recoil of primary and secondary weapons is reduced by 10%

gunslinger.name: Sleight of Hand
gunslinger.description: Switch weapons 25% faster (the bonus is stackable but can't be higher than 150%)

hellraiser.name: Demoman
hellraiser.description: Start with C4, Shotgun and Hailstorm MGL

hellraiser.name: Throwing arm
hellraiser.description: Throw distance of a C4 increased by 50%

hellraiser.name: Here Kitty
hellraiser.description: C4 will attract zombies for 5 seconds after being planted but can kill 35% less targets (base: 14)

hellraiser.name: Not Today
hellraiser.description: You may become incapacitated 1 additional time before dying

hellraiser.name: The perfect composition
hellraiser.description: The explosion radius of C4 and Claymores is increased by 25%

hellraiser.name: Welcome Mat
hellraiser.description: Upon trigger Claymores will attract zombies for 3 seconds before explosion. Start with Claymores

hellraiser.name: Green Fingered
hellraiser.description: Planting speed of Claymores is increased by 50%. 25% chance to plant the Claymore at no cost to your equipment. Start with Claymores

hellraiser.name: Welcoming Committee
hellraiser.description: Any mortar used by you or teammates can kill 25% more targets (base: 40)

hellraiser.name: Impact grenades
hellraiser.description: Projectiles fired from the Hailstorm MGL explode upon contact

hellraiser.name: Unshakeable
hellraiser.description: Self-inflicted explosive damage reduced by 100%

hellraiser.name: Directed Blast
hellraiser.description: You deal 100% more damage to zombies with all explosives

hellraiser.name: Nimble Thumbs
hellraiser.description: All shotguns' reload speed increased by 50%

hellraiser.name: You've worn me out
hellraiser.description: Killing enemies with equipment restores 2 grenades for the Hailstorm MGL

hellraiser.name: Demolition Squad
hellraiser.description: Explosive equipment can kill 25% more targets. Applies for the whole team

hellraiser.name: Bounty Hunter
hellraiser.description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

hellraiser.name: Wheatgrass
hellraiser.description: Health increased by 25%

hellraiser.name: Walk Softly
hellraiser.description: Start with a S890 shotgun

hellraiser.name: Smells like gunpowder
hellraiser.description: All Hailstorm MGLs within 10 meters will be automatically marked if you don't have a heavy weapon

hellraiser.name: Tooled Up
hellraiser.description: Increase Claymore capacity to 4 and C4 capacity to 3

hellraiser.name: Pickpocket
hellraiser.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

hellraiser.name: I'll Take That
hellraiser.description: Killing a special zombie restores one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

hellraiser.name: Shrapnel
hellraiser.description: All your explosives can kill 10% more targets

hellraiser.name: Free Refill I
hellraiser.description: Restores 1% of primary weapon ammo for each kill made with equipment

hellraiser.name: Free Refill II
hellraiser.description: Each kill made with equipment restores 1 round to your primary weapon magazine

hellraiser.name: Third Hand
hellraiser.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

hellraiser.name: Free Refill III
hellraiser.description: There is a chance that killing a special zombie will cause it to drop a Hailstorm MGL (cooldown: 180 seconds)

hellraiser.name: Hollywood
hellraiser.description: Explosive and fire damage dealt to yourself and your teammates reduced by 30%

hellraiser.name: Scorched Earth
hellraiser.description: Claymore and C4 explosions will set the nearby area on fire

hellraiser.name: Deep Pockets
hellraiser.description: Carried ammo capacity for heavy weapon increased by 35%

hellraiser.name: Hole Punch
hellraiser.description: Shotgun range increased by 50%

hellraiser.name: Alert red!
hellraiser.description: C4 explosions also release a gas cloud that hurts zombies

hellraiser.name: Senjata
hellraiser.description: Start with a Senjata PDW in your secondary weapon slot

hellraiser.name: Thumper
hellraiser.description: Start with a Thumper GL in your secondary weapon slot

hellraiser.name: Heavy Rain
hellraiser.description: Start with improved Hailstorm MGL that does 50% more damage, and has 50% more ammo. All Hailstorm MGL pickups for you also improved [base: 8 ammo]

hellraiser.name: Ride of the Valkyries
hellraiser.description: Start with an improved Multi-shot Rocket Launcher that kills 50% more zombies. All MRL202 Commando pickups for you are also improved [base: 4 ammo]

hellraiser.name: Knock Knock
hellraiser.description: Start with a Breaching Charge

hellraiser.name: Job Satisfaction
hellraiser.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants a temporary health boost

hellraiser.name: Predator
hellraiser.description: Killing special zombies boosts firearm damage by 50% for 10 seconds

hellraiser.name: All around is ashes
hellraiser.description: The Thumper GL deals 25% increased damage

hellraiser.name: Technician
hellraiser.description: C4, Claymore Landmines and MGL can kill 25% more targets

hellraiser.name: Throwing Arm II
hellraiser.description: Throw distance of a C4 increased by 25%

hellraiser.name: Sleight of Hand
hellraiser.description: Switch weapons 25% faster

hellraiser.name: Directed Blast II
hellraiser.description: Your explosives can kill 10% more targets

hellraiser.name: Thumper II
hellraiser.description: Carried ammo capacity for Thumper GL increased by 1

hellraiser.name: Hole Punch II
hellraiser.description: A 50% range increase for pistols and secondary SMGs

hellraiser.name: Blink of an eye
hellraiser.description: The reload speed of secondary weapons is increased by 15%

hellraiser.name: Knock Knock II
hellraiser.description: 10% chance of using a Breaching Charge without spending it

hellraiser.name: Directed Blast III
hellraiser.description: Your explosives can kill 5% more targets

fixer.name: Mule
fixer.description: Start with a Supply Bag and Scout Rifle. Increase carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons by 10% for all teammates

fixer.name: Kickback
fixer.description: When a teammate uses your Supply Bag there is a 20% chance you will also gain explosive ammo

fixer.name: Armory
fixer.description: Using a Supply Bag gives a 20% chance to restore one equipment charge. But the bag owner can only restore his equipment when someone else gains this benefit from his bag

fixer.name: Stand by Me
fixer.description: Increases firearm damage by 100% for 10 seconds when reviving or unpinning a teammate

fixer.name: It might work
fixer.description: You can restore a depleted automatic turret with a 20% chance (10% for the Horde mode)

fixer.name: Night Owl
fixer.description: Masking Grenades grant an additional temporary health boost. Start with Masking Grenades

fixer.name: Side Effects
fixer.description: Masking Grenade gas is lethal to zombies. Start with Masking Grenades

fixer.name: Give 'em Hell
fixer.description: Reviving a teammate grants explosive ammo for both of you

fixer.name: No need for instructions
fixer.description: Automatic turrets placed by you and your allies deal 25% more damage

fixer.name: Knock Knock
fixer.description: You start with a Breaching Charge

fixer.name: Paramedic
fixer.description: Revive speed increased by 100%

fixer.name: Cloakroom
fixer.description: Reviving a teammate grants masking effect for 3 seconds for both of you

fixer.name: Cheer up
fixer.description: Reviving a teammate refills one equipment charge for both of you

fixer.name: Please Stand Up
fixer.description: If everyone in a team is incapacitated or pinned by a zombie then the Fixer is able to stand up (cooldown 60 seconds)

fixer.name: My Round I
fixer.description: Increase carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons by 10% for you and all teammates

fixer.name: Wheatgrass
fixer.description: Health increased by 25%

fixer.name: Gunner
fixer.description: Start with Sporting Carbine Pac-15

fixer.name: Scrap metal... again
fixer.description: All equipment bags within 20 meters will be automatically marked if you have no equipment charges

fixer.name: One for the Road
fixer.description: Max Masking Grenade and Supply Bag capacity increased to 2. However Masking Grenade effect duration decreased by 3 seconds and Supply Bag contains 25% less explosive ammo

fixer.name: Pickpocket
fixer.description: Kill 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 90 seconds)

fixer.name: Scavenger
fixer.description: Killing special zombie restores one equipment charge (cooldown 90 seconds)

fixer.name: I am not a snack
fixer.description: There is a chance that killing a special zombie will cause it to drop an equipment bag (cooldown: 180 seconds)

fixer.name: Instant Replay
fixer.description: Anyone that uses your supply bag restores 20% of their primary weapon ammunition (base 10%)

fixer.name: Under the Table
fixer.description: Anyone entering Masking Grenade gas cloud restores 10% of primary weapon ammo

fixer.name: Go Get 'Em
fixer.description: Reviving a teammate will restore 25% of primary weapon's ammunition for you and your teammate

fixer.name: Almost missed
fixer.description: Damage to marked enemies is increased by 10% for you and your team

fixer.name: Efficiency
fixer.description: Supply bag contains 25% more explosive ammo. Masking grenade effect duration increased by 2 seconds

fixer.name: Lightning Hands
fixer.description: All semi automatic rifles' reload speed increased by 25%

fixer.name: Power Shot
fixer.description: All semi automatic rifles gain increased penetration

fixer.name: Casull 6
fixer.description: Start with a Casull 6 in your secondary weapon slot

fixer.name: It Ain't Much but...
fixer.description: The first 5% of ammo in the primary weapon's magazine will be explosive for the entire team

fixer.name: Fourth of July
fixer.description: Your Supply Bag can be used 1 more time(s) before depleting (base 4 uses)

fixer.name: Shadow Walker
fixer.description: Masking Grenade effect duration increased by 2 seconds (base 6 seconds)

fixer.name: Darkness Falls
fixer.description: Masking Grenade gas cloud duration is increased by 7 seconds (base 5 seconds)

fixer.name: Hidden pocket
fixer.description: Using a Supply Bag additionally restores the secondary weapon's ammunition

fixer.name: My Round II
fixer.description: Increase carried ammo capacity for heavy weapons by 10% for all teammates

fixer.name: Bandolier
fixer.description: Mortar and Stationary machinegun ammo capacity increased by 25% for all team. Durability of defenses increased by 25% for all team [base: 4 Mortar ammo 200 machinegun ammo]

fixer.name: The Big Five 0
fixer.description: Start with improved BF25 Payload Rifle that deals 50% more damage and has 50% more ammo. All BF25 Payload Rifle pickups for you also improved [base: 6 ammo]

fixer.name: 3 in 1
fixer.description: The first use of a placed Supply Bag will restore 10% health to you and your allies but its total usage number is reduced by 1

fixer.name: Corporate Power Nap
fixer.description: Unequipped weapon automatically reloads every 10 seconds for all teammates

fixer.name: Knock Knock II
fixer.description: 10% chance of using Breaching Charge without spending it

fixer.name: Paramedic II
fixer.description: Revive speed increased by 25%

fixer.name: My Round III
fixer.description: Carried ammo capacity increased for primary and secondary weapons by 5% for you and all teammates

fixer.name: Bounty Hunter
fixer.description: Deal 10% more damage to special zombies

fixer.name: Go Get 'Em II
fixer.description: Reviving a teammate will restore 10% of the primary weapon's ammunition for you and your teammate

fixer.name: I made it myself!
fixer.description: Autoturret ammunition is increased by 10% for the whole team

fixer.name: Kevlar
fixer.description: After reviving an ally both of you take 25% less damage for 5 seconds

fixer.name: Sleight of Hand
fixer.description: Switch weapons 25% faster

exterminator.name: Firestarter
exterminator.description: Start with Molotov and Shotgun. You deal 25% more damage during swarm attacks

exterminator.name: Pyromaniac
exterminator.description: Molotov's fire damage increased by 50%

exterminator.name: Hangover
exterminator.description: Molotovs burn 75% longer

exterminator.name: Crowd Control
exterminator.description: Push radius from melee attacks increased by 50%

exterminator.name: Minefield
exterminator.description: The maximum number of Claymores is increased by 1, but they can kill 15% fewer targets. Start with a Claymore

exterminator.name: Rage Mode
exterminator.description: When pinned down by usual or special zombies you will automatically rise up and push your attackers back (cooldown 300 seconds)

exterminator.name: All Elbows
exterminator.description: Movement speed penalty when zombies are very close reduced by 100%

exterminator.name: Rooted
exterminator.description: You can never be pinned down by usual zombies (does not affect special zombies)

exterminator.name: Stop, drop, and roll
exterminator.description: When you become incapacitated, you ignite enemies around you

exterminator.name: Dragon Hide
exterminator.description: Fire resistance increased by 100%

exterminator.name: Heavy Metal
exterminator.description: Start with improved RPGL4 that deals 100% more damage. All RPGL4 pickups for you also improved

exterminator.name: Heavy Metal II
exterminator.description: Start with improved Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun that deals 25% more damage, and has 25% more ammo. All Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun pickups for you also improved

exterminator.name: Big Bang
exterminator.description: Start with an improved Multi-shot Rocket Launcher that kills 50% more zombies. All MRL202 Commando pickups for you are also improved

exterminator.name: Bandolier
exterminator.description: Mortar and Stationary machinegun ammo capacity increased by 25% for all team. Durability of defenses increased by 25% for all team

exterminator.name: Deep Pockets
exterminator.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Wheatgrass
exterminator.description: Health increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Rifleman
exterminator.description: Start with ARK-103 Assault Rifle

exterminator.name: S890
exterminator.description: Start with an S890 Combat Shotgun

exterminator.name: Green Fingered
exterminator.description: Your Claymores are rigged to explode only when there are at least 5 targets in the blast area. Start with Claymore

exterminator.name: Fire Trap
exterminator.description: Claymore explosions set fire to surrounding area. Start with Claymore

exterminator.name: Combat Engineer
exterminator.description: 20% chance to restore an expended Defense Kit. (10% for Horde Mode)

exterminator.name: Burnout
exterminator.description: During swarm attacks, fire damage is increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Second Wind
exterminator.description: Instead of becoming incapacitated you will regain 25% health and keep going (cooldown 120 seconds)

exterminator.name: Job Satisfaction
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants temporary health boost (cooldown 30 seconds)

exterminator.name: Cloak and Dagger
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants masking effect for 3 seconds

exterminator.name: Heavy bone
exterminator.description: There is a chance that killing a special zombie will cause it to drop an MRL202 Commando (cooldown: 120 seconds)

exterminator.name: Hollywood II
exterminator.description: Explosives and fire damage dealt to yourself and your teammates reduced by 50%

exterminator.name: Broad Shoulders
exterminator.description: Heavy weapon ammo capacity increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Bullet Rain
exterminator.description: All fully automatic weapons' reload speed increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Third Hand
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

exterminator.name: Nimble fingers
exterminator.description: Shotgun reload speed is increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Party at my Place
exterminator.description: Maximum Molotov capacity increased to 3 and Claymore capacity to 4

exterminator.name: Pickpocket
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

exterminator.name: Pocket Factory
exterminator.description: You won't be able to pick equipment bags on the mission but your equipment will be constantly regenerating (150 seconds to replenish to maximum)

exterminator.name: Impromptu
exterminator.description: Special zombies are stunned by the Molotov's splash

exterminator.name: Know-How
exterminator.description: Molotovs and Claymores can kill 25% more targets

exterminator.name: Hot Sauce
exterminator.description: Molotov's splash damage increased by 100%

exterminator.name: Ghost
exterminator.description: Automatically receive masking effect if you are the last of your team still standing (does not apply if you are incapacitated or pinned)

exterminator.name: Heavy stride
exterminator.description: Claymore mines explode twice with a delay of 5 seconds, but each explosion can kill 15% fewer targets. Start with a Claymore

exterminator.name: Daredevil
exterminator.description: When there are more than 30 zombies in the area, firearm damage is increased by 25% and number of melee strikes before becoming fatigued increased by 2

exterminator.name: Wheatgrass II
exterminator.description: Health increased by 5%

exterminator.name: Bullet Rain II
exterminator.description: Shotgun and semi automatic weapons reload speed increased by 10%

exterminator.name: Know-How II
exterminator.description: Molotovs and Claymores can kill 10% more targets

exterminator.name: Deep Pockets II
exterminator.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary weapons increased by 10%

exterminator.name: Dragon Hide II
exterminator.description: Fire resistance for you and your team is increased by 10%

exterminator.name: Roseship
exterminator.description: Barbed wire can kill 10% more targets for the whole team

exterminator.name: Oily hands
exterminator.description: Molotov throw distance is increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Bandolier II
exterminator.description: All defense kits you install can kill 10% more targets and have 10% more ammo capacity
